about_the_game:
Wander through a cemetery under a full moon with the Dreamscapes: Graveyard episode DLC. Fly like a ghost through a landscape of graves, crypts and mausoleums situated among trees and pathways. Use the warp camera to manually jump from place to place in the scene or use the slideshow setting and they'll cycle through automatically.

For Halloween, we've scattered jack-o-lanterns throughout the graveyard. Find them all in the Hidden Objects game and earn the Pumpkin Hunt achievement! In Ambiance Mode you can hide the pumpkins to experience the cemetery without them.

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collector's Pass 2020/2021
detailed_description:
Wander through a cemetery under a full moon with the Dreamscapes: Graveyard episode DLC. Fly like a ghost through a landscape of graves, crypts and mausoleums situated among trees and pathways. Use the warp camera to manually jump from place to place in the scene or use the slideshow setting and they'll cycle through automatically.

For Halloween, we've scattered jack-o-lanterns throughout the graveyard. Find them all in the Hidden Objects game and earn the Pumpkin Hunt achievement! In Ambiance Mode you can hide the pumpkins to experience the cemetery without them.

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collector's Pass 2020/2021

movies.name: Dreamscapes, Graveyard - Natural Setting Rail Camera

name: Ambient Channels: Dreamscapes - Graveyard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD R7 250x
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8300
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti or AMD R7 290

short_description: In the Dreamscapes: Graveyard episode you'll fly through an immersive environment with graves, crypts and mausoleums spread throughout a landscape full of trees, pathways and crows. Go jack-o-lantern hunting in the Hidden Objects game. Find them all and earn the Pumpkin Hunt achievement!
